info.author: Devart
info.description:
TMetric is a free work time tracker for professionals and companies. It integrates with Trac and other widely used project management systems. With TMetric you can see all your work time activity in Trac. 

Installation

Let's setup TMetric so it can correctly capture your work time from Trac.

​1.Create TMetric account. It will take a few minutes.
https://app.tmetric.com/register

2.Install one of the following TMetric browser extensions depending on a browser you prefer:

​TMetric Chrome extension
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tmetric-extension/ffijoclmniipjbhecddgkfpdafpbdnen 

TMetric Firefox add-on
​https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tmetric-extension/ 

TMetric Opera add-on
​https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/tmetric-extension/ 

(optional) After registration, you can also install time tracking desktop app so you could track your work activity in details.

Link to desktop app https://tmetric.com/media/1079/tmetricdesktop_161825615.msi 

Now when you are all set, you can proceed to tracking work time in Trac.
info.name: TracTimeTracker
info.summary: Trac plugin which helps to trac your task and project time
info.html_description:
TMetric is a free work time tracker for professionals and companies. It integrates with Trac and other widely used project management systems. With TMetric you can see all your work time activity in Trac.

Installation

Let’s setup TMetric so it can correctly capture your work time from Trac.

​1.Create TMetric account. It will take a few minutes. https://app.tmetric.com/register

2.Install one of the following TMetric browser extensions depending on a browser you prefer:

​TMetric Chrome extension https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/tmetric-extension/ffijoclmniipjbhecddgkfpdafpbdnen

TMetric Firefox add-on ​https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tmetric-extension/

TMetric Opera add-on ​https://addons.opera.com/en/extensions/details/tmetric-extension/

(optional) After registration, you can also install time tracking desktop app so you could track your work activity in details.

Link to desktop app https://tmetric.com/media/1079/tmetricdesktop_161825615.msi

Now when you are all set, you can proceed to tracking work time in Trac.
